section.name: Request Publication of Document
section.span: How to ask the editor to publish a document?

div.p:
Requesting publication of the document 'multibazaar2009'. A window will popup where you can schedule at what date and time you want the publication to occur.
The editor will be notified and accept or reject this request.

section.p: In a document in view mode, e.g. after saving that document, click the 'schedule publication (request)' button at the top to request that the document be published.
The editor will be notified and accept or reject your request.
